snippet.title: UNO - iPhone / iPod touch trailer by Gameloft
snippet.description:
Now available on the App Store: http://itunes.apple.com/app/id296845804?mt=8

Play the #1 classic card game for fun with friends and family on your iPhone! Compete against the AI or friends in thrilling games. Relive all the crazy fun of UNO™: match colors or numbers with all your favorite cards or challenge yourself with increasingly difficult games in Tournament Mode. Choose your favorite way to play, use your Action Cards wisely and don't forget to call "UNO!" when you have only one card left!

- Visit the official UNO by Gameloft website : http://www.gameloft-uno.com
- Follow the official twitter page : http://www.twitter.com/UNO_Gameloft

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
